title: Conduct a Routine Property Inspection
description: A property manager needs to perform a semi-annual inspection of a rental property.

tasks.description: Notify the tenant of the upcoming inspection, providing at least 24 hours' notice as required by law.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a compliant and professional notice to the tenant.

tasks.description: Use a mobile app to conduct the inspection, following a standardized checklist (e.g., check smoke detectors, look for leaks).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the inspection checklist, taking photos of any issues.

tasks.description: Generate an inspection report and create work orders for any identified maintenance issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report and creates necessary work orders.
